title: Ragù alla Napoletana
description: Ragù is the traditional Sunday lunch for most southern Italian families: the tomato sauce dresses the pasta and the meat is served as a main course.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz topside of beef, chopped into medium-sized pieces
2 tbsp tomato purée, diluted in 100ml/3½fl oz red wine
salt and freshly ground black pepper
